name: Oh No, Zombies Again!
description:
A top-down twin-stick shooter. Kill zombies. Save folks. Save yourself.

Following a zombie-apocalypse, your new beginning is a small outpost that you now call home. Protect yourself and others by eradicating the hordes of zombies that infiltrate the outpost. Your weapons will improve as you gain experience. Use an auto-fire weapon for more hits, but fewer bullets, or stick with a standard single-shot weapons - it's your choice! Can you complete all 8 of the missions?

Supports controller/gamepad and keyboard/mouse.

 - WASD / Left stick = move  - Mouse / Right stick = look  - Left Mouse Button / Right Trigger = fire  - D-Pad Up/Down / Mouse Wheel = change weapon  - ESC / Start = pause

Known issues:

I'm seeing an error when running in the browser, so I've also uploaded the Windows build which does work fine.

As Brackeys would say: "PLAYTEST!", and this isn't my first game jam, so I have no excuse - but, one day I will learn to do play testing and balancing at least one day before submission. Lesson learned?

Objectives disappear after the first mission. Radio Tower = NW. Water Tower = W of Center. Ambulance = SE. Prison Bus = NE.

Mini-map indicators remain on for all objectives, so pay attention to the mission messages.

Zombie pathfinding doesn't work well in the SE spawn location.
